author: charles
msg: Modified conf.xml to match MatchLoader code

author: charles
msg: Modified conf.xml to match new package names.

author: serge
msg: Initial documentation on packaged mailets and matchers.  Mailet documentation only begun, and new matchers added since documentation started.

author: serge
msg: Moved user repository classes into their own directory so we can add more later on without cluttering up generic james package.  Also removed user manager altogether in favor of a single shared user repository (which was all user manager was doing currently).

author: serge
msg: Lots of comments were changed and reindented to hopefully make it easier to read and configure for a beginner.  Intro at top for beginners also begun.  Made various modifications to support 1) removing user manager (adding <userRepository> setting, 2) moving classes to mailrepository and userrepository package. 3) reorganized LDAP configuration to the configurable repository, as well as database settings. 4) added anti-spam meassures so blocks some basic spam and makes it out of the box you cannot relay email.
